Text:
If anyone's having a hard time because of download speed, try this torrent:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7102520/Shuffle_-_Really_Really__amp_amp__Tick_Tack

@Impliedsex are you sure you mounted the image properly? Also, certify your computer's regional settings is in japanese. Just go control panel -> regional and language options and change "regional options" and "advanced" tabs to japanese and restart your pc. If it isn't listed on the language options, insert your OS cd in your computer and install the additional language packages.
